pageContent: Purpose: The Health Policy Survey and Research Committee of the American Urological Association and the Gallup organization have performed 9 surveys of American urologists since 1992 for the purpose of assessing demographics and practice patterns. The results of the 2001 survey are presented.

metaData.source:
Update in the management of prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/2392082/
